TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeEntryPointMethod extends System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod

Docs.summary: Represents the entry point method of an executable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEntryPointMethod> is a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod> that represents the entry point method of an executable.
## Examples This example demonstrates using a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEntryPointMethod> to indicate the method to start program execution at.
